title: Anybody play league for this reason?
body:
One of the huge reasons I've played league for so long, is that it's a game I'm capable to competitively play while...
**listening to music**

Any other competitive game REQUIRES the use of sound to play at capacity. League lets me chill out and play well at the same time.

granted any other casual game like CoD you can too

replies.body: I actually find there to be a number of important audio cues in LoL. I'll occasionally listen to music while I play, but only when I want to drown out noise near me, as the added music often hides these cues.
